text: Kya tumne dekha nahin un logon ko jinhein sargoshiyan karne se mana kardiya gaya tha phir bhi woh wahi harkat kiye jatay hain jissey unhein mana kiya gaya tha? Yeh log chup chup kar aapas mein gunaah aur zyadati aur Rasool ki nafarmani ki baatein karte hain.
